section.title:
inventory history detailed by location
locations detailed inventory history of Detailed Inventory History by Location
section.para: To view detailed Inventory history by Location, select the "Detailed Inventory History by Location" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: The display will only list Inventory history for Multiple Location Control Items. Items without Multiple Location Control turned on will not be listed in the display. Multiple Location Control is set in the Item Site record.

section.para: When displaying detailed Inventory history by Location, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Location whose detailed Inventory History you want to display. Displays detailed Inventory history for selected Location.
Indicates whether the Location is Netable or not.
Indicates whether the Location is Restricted or not.
Select one of the available transaction types:
Displays receipts into Inventory from Manufacturing, purchases, or miscellaneous receipts.
Displays issues from Inventory to Manufacturing.
Displays Inter-Warehouse Transfers and Location and Lot/Serial Number reassignments.

note.para: The system prefixes Order Numbers with letters indicating the Order type. For example, Work Orders are prefixed with "WO", Purchase Orders with "PO", and Sales Orders with "SO". These letters are for display purposes only and are not considered part of the Order Number.

listitem.para: Select to display detailed Inventory history by Location for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose detailed Inventory history by Location you want to display.
